```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r, libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(tigris)
library(sf)
```

```{r, reading in homicide csv}
homicides <- read_csv("../data/homicide-data.csv")
```

```{r, filtering to Oakland, CA}
oak_homicides <- homicides %>% 
  filter(city == "Oakland")
```

```{r}
oak_homicides <- st_as_sf(oak_homicides, coords = c("lon", "lat")) %>% 
  st_set_crs(4269)
```
